3: The mission's over. The damage taken was less than expected.
I'm glad the mission wasn't too hard. It's good to have everyone back safe and sound.
Still, we need to rest up and debrief.
We can't be slacking on our maintenance. Just like infections in humans, they will grow to be lethal if left untreated for too long.
Lee is always so strict on maintenance.
Not for nothing. I'm doing this for your 'health.'
Especially you, Lucia. You always push yourself too far.
Oh. Sorry about that.
You too, Commandant. You should treat this more seriously as well.
I'm not kidding.
Look what I found! Lee is being a meany to his own commandant!
Fear not, Commandant! I'm here to rescue you!
Of course! I did promise you I'd stay safe, didn't I?
Now that I'm here, you can't bully the commandant like that anymore!
...Just how dumb are you?
Hey! Why are you always nagging me?!
I don't want to talk to stupid people.
And I don't want to talk to you!
What a friendly banter.
No, it wasn't!
Lee, Kamui, what a great friendship you've got!
